targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${Host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${Host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 * ${Nominalpower}.0 / 1000.0
  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery_charge_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "time_left_ns")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${Host}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status_OL"] == "true")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: last)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _value: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 * ${Nominalpower}.0 / 1000.0
  }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")

  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: host
list.name: Host
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")

  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["model"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["model"])
  |> distinct(column: "model")
list.label: model
list.name: UPSmodel
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["model"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["model"])
  |> distinct(column: "model")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "upsd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nominal_power")
list.label: nominalpower
list.name: Nominalpower
list.query:

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["model"] == "${UPSmodel}")
